thread.title: Flotsam spotted near where MH370 debris found
thread.title_full: Flotsam spotted near where MH370 debris found | News24

author: news24.com
title: Flotsam spotted near where MH370 debris found
text:
Saint-Denis de la Reunion - An Air France pilot on Tuesday spotted a white object floating in the water during an approach to Reunion island, where a wing part of Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 was found in July, the airline said.
Local authorities in the overseas French territory said they had ordered a ship to divert to the area where the unidentified object was spotted, about 70km off the island, and a military plane was due to fly over the zone.
The pilot on the flight from Paris to Reunion island spotted the object early on Tuesday while flying at an altitude of 3 000m, Air France said in a statement.
Flight MH370 disappeared on March 8 last year, inexplicably veering off course en route from Kuala Lumpur to Beijing with 239 people on board.
